title: Gardens by the Bay Christmas Train Show 2025
blurb: A festive train display for the holiday season.
description: Experience the magic of Christmas with a delightful train show at Gardens by the Bay. This family-friendly event features intricate train displays, festive decorations, and a joyful atmosphere. Perfect for visitors of all ages, the Christmas Train Show offers a unique and enchanting way to celebrate the holidays. Enjoy the beautiful scenery of Gardens by the Bay while immersing yourself in the festive spirit. The show includes various train layouts, miniature landscapes, and interactive elements that will captivate children and adults alike. A wonderful opportunity to create lasting memories with your loved ones during the Christmas season. The event is designed to be accessible and enjoyable for families with young children, providing a safe and engaging environment for everyone.
keyword_tag: Christmas, Train Show, Family, Festive, Gardens by the Bay

title: Gardens by the Bay Christmas Train Show
blurb: Christmas Train Show is back in Flower Dome!
description: The Christmas Train Show returns after its debut in 2024! This year, trains from Denmark, the USA, and Singapore stop by Flower Dome in a magical snowy setting. Flower Domeâ€™s signature Christmas trees and poinsettias enhance the warmth of the yuletide season. Opening Hours are from 9.00am to 9.00pm. Admission charge to Flower Dome applies. Other events include Nature and Sustainability Tours and Sunflower Surprise. Jurassic World: The Experience is also available at Cloud Forest. Enjoy the festive atmosphere and explore the various attractions within Gardens by the Bay.
keyword_tag: Christmas, Train Show, Flower Dome, Gardens by the Bay, Family, Holiday

title: Nature and Sustainability Tours
blurb: Free guided walks about climate change!
description: Join us on free guided walks to learn about climate change, biodiversity and sustainable features in the Gardens! Every Saturday & Sunday only at various timings. Explore the beauty of nature while gaining insights into environmental conservation. These tours are supported by Keppel and offer an educational experience for all ages. Discover the hidden gems of Gardens by the Bay and learn about the importance of sustainability. Perfect for families and nature enthusiasts looking to expand their knowledge and appreciation for the environment.
datetime_display: Every Sat & Sun only Various timings
keyword_tag: Nature, Sustainability, Tours, Gardens by the Bay, Climate Change, Biodiversity

title: Sunflower Surprise
blurb: Experience the colour and culture of Jaipur!
description: Experience the colour and culture of the Pink City of Jaipur amidst the vibrancy display of sunflowers and myriad marigolds. From Wed, 22 Oct - Sun, 16 Nov 2025, 9.00am - 9.00pm at Flower Dome. Immerse yourself in the beauty of these vibrant flowers and explore the cultural richness of Jaipur. This event offers a unique opportunity to appreciate the natural wonders and artistic heritage of India. Perfect for families and flower enthusiasts seeking a delightful and visually stunning experience at Gardens by the Bay.
keyword_tag: Sunflower, Jaipur, Flower Dome, Gardens by the Bay, Culture, Marigold

title: Jurassic World: The Experience
blurb: Life-sized animatronic dinosaurs in Cloud Forest!
description: Jurassic World: The Experience comes to the misty landscapes of Cloud Forest at Gardens by the Bay, featuring life-sized animatronic dinosaurs in an immersive adventure inspired by the blockbuster film franchise. From Thu, 29 May 2025, 9.00am - 9.00pm. Explore the prehistoric world and encounter these magnificent creatures up close. This experience offers a thrilling and educational journey for all ages. Discover the wonders of Jurassic World and create unforgettable memories at Gardens by the Bay.
keyword_tag: Jurassic World, Dinosaurs, Cloud Forest, Gardens by the Bay, Adventure, Film

blurb: Free guided walks on climate change and biodiversity.
description: Join us on free guided walks to learn about climate change, biodiversity and sustainable features in the Gardens! These tours are available every Saturday and Sunday at various timings. Explore the gardens and discover the importance of sustainability in a fun and engaging way. Perfect for families and nature enthusiasts who want to learn more about the environment and how we can protect it. The tours are designed to be informative and interactive, making it a great experience for all ages. Discover the beauty and importance of nature while enjoying a leisurely walk through the gardens.

title: Gardens by the Bay Sunflower Surprise
blurb: Experience Jaipur's culture amidst sunflowers and marigolds.
description: Experience the colour and culture of the Pink City of Jaipur amidst the vibrancy display of sunflowers and myriad marigolds. This special display brings the beauty of India to Gardens by the Bay, offering a unique and immersive experience for visitors of all ages. Wander through the fields of sunflowers and marigolds, and discover the rich cultural heritage of Jaipur. Perfect for families, photography enthusiasts, and anyone who appreciates the beauty of nature and culture. Don't miss this opportunity to experience a touch of India in the heart of Singapore. Enjoy the vibrant colours and fragrant blooms in this stunning floral display.

title: Gardens by the Bay Jurassic World: The Experience
blurb: Life-sized dinosaurs in Cloud Forest's misty landscapes.
description: Jurassic World: The Experience comes to the misty landscapes of Cloud Forest at Gardens by the Bay, featuring life-sized animatronic dinosaurs in an immersive adventure inspired by the blockbuster film franchise. Explore the prehistoric world and encounter magnificent creatures up close. This thrilling experience is perfect for families and dinosaur enthusiasts of all ages. Discover the wonders of paleontology and learn about the fascinating world of dinosaurs in a unique and engaging setting. Get ready for an unforgettable adventure as you step back in time and come face-to-face with these incredible creatures. The experience combines education and entertainment, making it a must-see attraction.
keyword_tag: dinosaurs, Jurassic World, animatronic, Cloud Forest
